short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using Machine Learning to make Adblock even better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new way of blocking ads. With the power of machine learning we can make browsing the web better my introducing a more accurate and efficient way of blocking ads on the web.
